mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spring_users (userid, name, password, exp, level, img) VALUES ( #{userid}, #{name}, PASSWORD(#{password}), 0, 1, #{img})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM spring_users WHERE userid = #{userid} AND password = PASSWORD(#{password})
mapper.update: UPDATE spring_users SET exp = exp+5 WHERE userid = #{userid}
UPDATE spring_users u , spring_level l SET u.level = u.level+1 , u.exp = 0 WHERE u.level = l.level AND u.exp >= l.exp AND u.userid = #{userid};
